items.name: Alternative Currency East India Porter
items.desc:
6 x 440ml Cans Alternative Currency East India Porter 5.8% ABV
Our interpretation of a style rich with not only flavour but historical impact, the East India Porter. Waves of charred toast, breakfast coffee grounds and roasted cacao nibs mingle atop our signature soft mouthfeel. Bright apricot yeast esters and a punchy dry hop of Amarillo and Ekuanot illuminate the darkness! An enduring roasty bitterness washes over palate, before encouraging another gulp! Drinkability is high, thereâ€™s no pastries aboard. True to style, with a South West Coast influence.

items.desc:

items.name: Headband Pale Ale
items.desc:
6 x Headband Pale Ale 5.5% ABV
A favourite in the brewery and apart from small continual tweaks here and there, it remains extremely close to the 2014 pilot brews and 2015 release version. The use of dual yeast strains brings both a clean crispness to the finish and juicy peach aromatics. A touch of medium crystal and some superstar hops results in a satisfyingly orange hue that marries up to strong orange citrus notes.

items.name: Invisible Ceiling Pale Ale
items.desc:
6 x Invisible Ceiling Pale Ale 4.7% ABV
BRU-1 and Strata dominate proceedings in this full yet light and slightly crisp pale offering. The sister to 300 Laps that oozes grapefruit, pineapple and a skunky dankness. A little bitter bite and a dry finish remind you it's grown up and make you reach for that glass again... and again...and again.
